subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dan Johnson doubled home the winning run in the 10th inning after Jonathan Papelbon had his first blown save in the ninth and the visiting Oakland Athletics defeated the Boston Red Sox, 5-4, last night.
snippet: Dan Johnson doubled home the winning run in the 10th inning after Jonathan Papelbon had his first blown save in the ninth and the visiting Oakland Athletics defeated the Boston Red Sox, 5-4, last night.
